mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO progress
id, account, process_id, data,
msg, files, current_sequence,
VALUES
#{pojo.id}, #{pojo.account}, #{pojo.process_id}, #{pojo.data},
#{pojo.msg}, #{pojo.files}, #{pojo.current_sequence},
mapper.select: select u.name as user_name, u.account as user_account , c.stage_id, c.id as unit_id, c.name as unit_name, c.description as unit_description, c.role_id , s.sequence as stage_sequence , p.id as progress_id, p1.name as process_name, p.account as progress_account, p.current_sequence as current_sequence , p.data, p.msg as progress_msg, p.files as progress_files , p1.id as process_id from ( ( (progress p left join process p1 on p1.id = p.process_id) left join user u on p.account=u.account) left join check_unit c on p.process_id = c.process_id ), stage s where s.id = c.stage_id and c.role_id = (select role_id from role_has_user where user_account = #{account});
